review: Right out of the box this thing is awesome! Just plug it in and go, it's that easy.  The only thing I would say they can do better is at this point is have the voice recognition work for YouTube and everything else.  Not just prime. It is still very easy to use and navigate.  I think that someone new to electronics would even be able to navigate with no problems at all.  It is also VERY VERY FAST. All in all I love this thing. I highly recommend it.

review: The product was easy to get set up. Instructions were clear and precise. I was surprised that so much of the content available had to be purchased. That is why I gave it only 3 stars.

review: I'm really happy with my Fire TV.  It's super easy to navigate.  My six year old niece figured it out no problem.  Has the apps I like to watch and more I didn't know about too.  Amazons customer service was great when I asked for a price adjustment due to it going on sale the day after I bought it.  Very satisfied customer here!!
